member.name: MF_PLUGIN_CONTROL_POLICY
member.summary: Defines policy settings for the method.

member.name: MF_PLUGIN_CONTROL_POLICY.MF_PLUGIN_CONTROL_POLICY_USE_ALL_PLUGINS
member.summary: Enumerate all registered sources and transforms.

member.name: MF_PLUGIN_CONTROL_POLICY.MF_PLUGIN_CONTROL_POLICY_USE_APPROVED_PLUGINS
member.summary: Enumerate only approved sources and transforms. Third-party components are excluded unless the component is registered with a valid merit value, or the component was registered locally by the application.

member.name: MF_PLUGIN_CONTROL_POLICY.MF_PLUGIN_CONTROL_POLICY_USE_WEB_PLUGINS
member.summary: Restrict enumeration to components intended for use in a web browser.
